message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering the product at $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and services we provide. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate the premium features and quality of your product, but I'm afraid $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to consider a purchase, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $9500?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I would like to propose a price of $10000 for the product. This price still reflects the high-quality craftsmanship and features that our product offers, while being more accessible to you. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget at $10000. I'm willing to pay a premium for a high-quality product, but I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at $9000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and I'm glad to see we're getting closer. Considering the value of our product and your budget, I propose a price of $9500 for the product. This price still allows us to cover our costs and maintain the quality and service we provide, while making it more affordable for you. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget at $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9250. Would you be willing to consider this price?
